availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A English-born, Kentucky stone mason. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Elmina Snowden. Father of Sarah J. Snowden, John Snowden, Rebecca Snowden, Ellen Snowden, Susan Snowden, and William Snowden.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 134-135; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Town of Hawesville, p. 13; "John Snowden," (https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=89301458&ref=acom) (accessed on April 6, 2017).
